name: The Bone Zone
description:
The Bone Zone

In this game you roll around as a skull, picking up other bones to put your skeleton back together.

The game was created over the course of three hours as part of the Solent Spooky Jam.

How to Play

Movement - WASD/ Arrow Keys / Left Joystick on a Controller

Selection (Menu) - Enter / A on Controller

Created By
  • Luke Howard - Design
  • Ethan Champion - Code
  • Josh Lawton - Art
  • Seb Long - Art
  • Stephen Ray - Code
